alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:14PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Weber... southwestern Cache...east central Box Elder...Davis...west central Morgan and northeastern Tooele Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 513 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Bear River City to 8 miles west of South Willard to near Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Farmington, Brigham City, Tremonton, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, Centerville, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper, South Weber, Perry and Wellsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 322 and 381. Interstate 84 between mile markers 40 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
